name: Cool Cold Cube
description:
CCC is a small adventure about an icecube trying to reach the refrigerator before it melts. For a short time the player can forget the every day life and help the little cube through a kitchen full of danger and puzzles. Avoid fiery entagonists and get to the cold save place. The small kitchen of CCC is filled with puzzles, platforming challenges and small enemies. One the way are items to help and some objects aren't just there to look nice.

[This is a (schoolproject) prototype, made by 4 people, in one Semester!]
